EmoteActions.Message: This mask is interesting, yet it is too damaged for me to make use of.
What a wonderous metal! It seems to be even more potent than a standard Virindi Mask! If only it weren't broken ...
What a wonderous metal! It seems to be even more potent than a standard Virindi Mask! If only it weren't broken ...
This would provide a fine base for the wrap worn by our people back on Ispar, but it will need to be repaired before I can do anything with it.
Or you could give this to my apprentice after you have it fixed. He'll restore it to be more like the Virindi that it was taken from.
This would provide an excellent base for a head wrap, but it will need to be repaired before I can do anything with it.
I'm sorry, the carapace of Olthoi are to hard to carve.  Perhaps you can find someone else to help.  I heard to the north they can make these into strong helmets.
Thank you, but I am not a cook. Here, you keep it.
%mn whispers to you, "Aye, I know your secret One-Eyed %tn."

A find worthy of crafting into a robe! But you still require another arm, two legs and a torso. You should be able to assemble those together without my aid. But only a master such as myself would be able to craft such objects into a fully wearable outfit.

What a fine mask! Such well-preserved fur!
You know, I really hate these creatures.
HA! HA! HA! HA! HA! HA! HA! HA! HA!
Oh, that's funny.
Wonderful craftsmanship! We mask makers are a crafty lot!
I hear Elysa holds the most wonderful costume parties. You should wear this if you're ever lucky enough to receive an invitation!
Think of the havoc you could cause in the marketplace!
Do you smell that? This thing stinks!

This is very odd. This mask is made out of a very strange material. I can unwind it, almost like thread on a spindle. Curious ... Here is my finished product. May it protect you as it did the Avengers of Yasif.
This is an item of power. Truly, it is a work of art.
This will only take me a moment and I think that you will like the outcome. Another twist in the cloth here and yes ... yes, that's it.
This Shroud of Night will guard your face from the desert sands and aid you in your travels.
This will only take me a moment and I think that you will like the outcome. Another twist in the cloth here and yes ... yes, that's it.
This Shroud of Night will guard your face from the desert sands and aid you in your travels.
Ah, how graceful ... and yet quite strong. Let me just work with it a moment ...
Although you watch closely, the mask maker's hands move too quickly and skillfully to follow.

There is no greater hero in our culture than Yasif ibn Salayyar. I have chosen to honor him with this piece. May the face of this great poet allow you to see, as he did, with a sight beyond sight, and grant you wisdom untold.
There you are!
It is said that a poet can find beauty in even the lowest of forms.  Whoever said this has obviously never met a Drudge.
There are many undead within the confines of the desert.  Perhaps by wearing this you will pass amongst them unnoticed, but they have a way of sensing living flesh...
Hmmm.  I have seen creatures like this before, but not so well equipped.  Wherever did you acquire this trophy?  It's skull is very thick, providing a very strong mask.
There are many of these currently roaming Dereth.  Be careful that wearing this mask does not cause you to be mistaken for one.
I have heard of these creatures roaming the mountains, and recently coming down to the grasslands.  Is this a Mattekar?
There are many of these creatures roaming the desert.  They seem to be increasing in frequency at an incredible rate.
I have seen many of these creatures as well.  They seem to be a creation of the Virindi.  This mask seems to have extremely odd abilities.
Here you go, a new version of the Mosswart Mask.
Here you go, a new version of the Banderling Mask.
That's a stinky fish head! You want one of these fresh masks.
I'm sorry, I'm not a cook.
You want a what? You should never put a ch... Okay... I won't judge you. Here.
TurnedInHeadHollowMinion@Again
TurnedInHeadHollowMinion
These are hard to find. Here, nobody will know who you are in this mask!
MaskKnathColors
You seriously want a mask made from this thing?
Well ok...

Considering that you do not seem pleased with the masks, perhaps you would enjoy this instead?

Tusker heads are large enough to make packs out of.  Here, have one.
Tusker heads are large enough to make packs out of.  Here, have one.

Give me a moment and I will craft a fine costume for you from this body.

I've always had a soft spot in my heart for mites.
They taste great with a little tarragon and melted butter. You wouldn't happen to have carved off any meat when you obtained this head, would you? No? Ah well.
They wait thousands of years to seek vengeance for who knows what ancient crime, and what happens when they finally arrive on Dereth? Some tiny Isparian lops off their head! I love it!
Ridiculous creatures, these chitticks. But they're great in a stew!
They wait thousands of years to seek vengeance for who knows what ancient crime, and what happens when they finally arrive on Dereth? Some tiny Isparian lops off their head! I love it!
You'll be the belle of the ball with this fine costume!
I just learned how to make this costume. I must say, I am most impressed with myself!
Now, this is one fine costume. Go forth and scare some new arrivals!
A pleasure to meet you! I am Janda. If you would be so kind as to give me a creature's head or facial covering, I will make it into a mask that will allow you to participate in the celebration.
Did you know there is a ceremonial mask for each culture? I so long for the day that I can make a ceremonial mask of my own!
The desert is quite hot during the day. Don't wear your mask too much in direct sunlight, or you may suffer from heat stroke.
Hey, you already turned one of these in to me. Let's finish the first one before we make a second mask.
I'll just stretch the cloth over the mask and secure it and... there now you have a nice new... one of these.
TurnedInHeadHollowMinion
Yes, I can make a mask of this if you find me a Scarecrow Head.
TurnedInHeadHollowMinion
This already seems to be a mask of sorts.  Well, here you go.
